text: I've Been Expecting You is the second studio album by English singer- songwriter Robbie Williams. It was released on 26 October 1998. ==Track listing== *All the production done by Guy Chambers and Steve Power. * MVC stores in the UK offered a free bonus CD with the purchase of either Life Thru a Lens or I've Been Expecting You during Christmas 1999. The album did not contain any unreleased material, but contained twenty-one previously released B-sides and demos from both eras. Notes ==References== Category:Robbie Williams albums Category:1998 albums
title: I've Been Expecting You
